```{r setup}
library(metacore)
```

Step 1) Identify what type of specification format you have

```{r step1}
spec_to_metacore("SDTM_spec_CDISC_pilot.xlsx")

```

Step 2) If you have the type style of specification. Attempt to run with the lower level built-in specification to metacore build. Even if this fails it will help identify the issues.

-   A common issue will be different column names / sheet names. If this is the cause you just need to provide a named list of column names to the built in functions
